text: Have you ever heard the phrase "having butterflies in my stomach?"
Having "butterflies in my stomach" means to feel very nervous.
For example, when someone is about to perform on stage,...
...she might have butterflies in her stomach.
In other words, she feels very nervous.
Let's check out the next few clips to learn and practice how to use this idiom.
All you need to do to get rid of a few butterflies in the stomach is just relax.
The feeling of butterflies comes from chemicals...
...produced by the body in stressful situations.
